history.text: Hello, how are you?
How am I? Well, I'm just dying to tell you about a super iconic movie. Pardon my excitement
Are you ready for this spill?
Oh, that sounds great! what movie is it?
Absolutely.
The movie is called The Blind Side. Have you heard of it?
I have heard of it but never actually saw it. It's a football movie, right?
Yes, it is. Semi-football, semi-drama!
Who stars in it?
Sandra Bullock, a movie legend. Tim McGraw, also a legend.
Oh yea, I'm a big Sandra Bullock fan. Was the movie rated pretty high?
6/10 rotten tomatoes but that's an understatement
I can give you a brief rundown of the plot.
That would be great!

Basically the protagonist, 'Big Mike' is notorious for running away from his many foster homes to take care of his mother. Sandra Bullock and Tim take him under their wing when he's admitted to a prestigious school their kids attend for his athletic ability.
Does he end up getting in trouble?
I don't want to spoil it but I will say there were some bumps in the road.
Ah, I see. When did the movie come out?
2000, but the premise is very modern. It would've done well this year with the current social climate
Very relevant themes
2009 pardon
It's not that old! Haha
Oh yea I Think I'm remembering some of the movie now. Mike is a black child right?
haha, yea for me 2000 still feels like yesterday so I wouldn't have been surprised.
Yep. Which makes the movie that much more interesting with the cultural differences
Yea, that is very interesting. They should make more movies like that. Movies these days are almost all just superheroes and robots
Haha, yeah this is a really loaded movie in comparison. Very thought/discussion-provoking.
Well it definitely sounds interesting. A very creative story. Was this based on a true story?
It is based on a true story! It's a biographical film.
Oh wow, that makes it even better . Do you know who the director was?
John Lee Hancock! Everyone attached to this film in general is awesome
The acting is another strong point. Sandra Bullock made this a real tear-jerker.
That's really great. I am definitely going to check it out.  Thank you for the recommendation! It was great meeting you.
Have a wonderful rest of your day!

uid2response.feedback: They did a great job in explaining the movie without giving away the main spoilers. I'll definitely watch it.
